ToolPage.promptExample1: A cinematic close-up of rain on neon streets, slow motion.
ToolPage.promptExample2: A cozy cafe at golden hour, gentle camera pan.
ToolPage.promptExample3: A futuristic skyline with soft fog and glowing lights.
ToolPage.tipsLine1: Be specific about subject, lighting, and motion.
ToolPage.tipsLine3: Add mood words: cinematic, dreamy, minimal.
ToolPage.generatingHint: This video is being generated. You can start another task meanwhile.

hero.title: Create Stunning Videos from Text
hero.description: Describe your vision in plain text and let AI bring it to life. From cinematic scenes to product showcases, the possibilities are endless.

items.title: Cinematic Mountain Scene
items.prompt: A majestic mountain range at golden hour, camera slowly flying through valleys

items.title: Urban City Timelapse
items.prompt: New York City timelapse at night, cars leaving light trails, buildings glowing

items.title: Ocean Sunset
items.prompt: Calm ocean waves at sunset, camera slowly zooming out, peaceful atmosphere

items: Simply describe what you want to see
Access to cutting-edge AI models (Sora 2, Veo 3.1, etc.)
Generate audio and sound effects automatically
Multiple aspect ratios for any platform

hero.title: Transform Your Images into Stunning Videos
hero.description: Upload any photo and watch AI bring it to life with smooth, realistic motion. Perfect for social media, marketing, and creative projects.

items.title: Photo to Living Scene
items.prompt: A girl walking on the beach, hair flowing in the wind, golden sunset

items.title: Product Animation
items.prompt: Smartphone rotating on white background with floating particles

items.title: Abstract Art Animation
items.prompt: Swirling colors and shapes morphing smoothly, psychedelic style

items: Upload any photo (JPG, PNG, WEBP up to 10MB)
Multiple AI models for different animation styles
Full HD output up to 1080p resolution

hero.title: Turn Reference Images into Videos
hero.description: Upload a reference image and let AI animate it with style changes, effects, or variations while keeping the subject consistent.

items.title: Style Transfer
items.prompt: Transform the image into anime style with vibrant colors

items.title: Add Weather Effects
items.prompt: Add rain and fog atmosphere to the scene

items.title: Change Season
items.prompt: Convert summer scene to winter with snow

items: Upload reference images (JPG, PNG, WEBP up to 10MB)
Maintain core subject identity and composition
Create multiple variations from one reference
Support for various artistic styles and effects

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about VideoFly template
FAQ.contact: Still have questions? Contact us at

template.question: What is VideoFly template?
template.answer: VideoFly is a production-ready AI video generation SaaS template built with Next.js 15, React 19, and Drizzle ORM. It includes everything you need to launch your own AI video platform: user authentication, credit system, AI provider integration, payment processing, and a beautiful UI ready for customization.

deployment.question: How do I deploy this template?
deployment.answer: VideoFly can be deployed to Vercel, Railway, or any Node.js hosting platform. Simply connect your GitHub repository, set up the required environment variables, and deploy. The template includes detailed documentation in the /docs folder to guide you through the process.

aiModels.question: Which AI models are supported?
aiModels.answer: The template currently supports Evolink (Sora 2, Wan 2.6, Veo 3.1, Seedance) and Kie.ai. The modular provider architecture makes it easy to add more AI providers. You can configure models and pricing in the config/pricing-user.ts file.

credits.question: How does the credit system work?
credits.answer: VideoFly uses a FIFO-based credit system with freeze/settle/release pattern. Users purchase credit packages or subscriptions, which are consumed when generating videos. The system supports credit expiration, refunds, and detailed transaction history.

customization.question: Can I customize the UI and branding?
customization.answer: Absolutely! The template is built with Tailwind CSS 4 and shadcn/ui components, making customization straightforward. All colors, fonts, and styling can be modified through the Tailwind configuration. The component structure is modular and well-documented.

payment.question: What payment providers are integrated?
payment.answer: VideoFly integrates with Creem as the primary payment provider, with Stripe available as a secondary option. Both support subscriptions and one-time purchases. The payment webhook system automatically handles credit allocation to user accounts.

Footer.tagline: Transform your ideas into stunning videos with AI.

About.title: About VideoFly
About.description: We help teams turn product ideas into short, high-performing video ads with AI.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.body: Make video creation fast, reliable, and measurable for growth teams.

whatWeBuild.title: What we build
whatWeBuild.body: A workflow-first AI video studio focused on product-to-video ads, from brief to storyboard to variations.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: A short summary of how we collect and use data.

summary.title: Summary
summary.body: We collect account, usage, and billing data to provide the service and improve performance.

items.account: Account details like name and email
items.usage: Usage data such as prompts, settings, and generation logs

items.deliver: Provide video generation and account services
items.support: Respond to support requests and prevent abuse

choices.title: Your choices
choices.body: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data by contacting us.

Privacy.footerNote: This summary is for convenience and does not replace the full policy.

Terms.title: Terms of Service

usage.title: Using the service
usage.body: Use VideoFly responsibly and comply with applicable laws and platform policies.

billing.title: Billing & credits
billing.body: Subscriptions and credit packs grant usage rights according to your plan. Credits are consumed by generation.

content.title: Content and ownership
content.body: You retain ownership of your input content. Generated outputs are provided to you subject to your plan.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.body: VideoFly is provided as-is without warranties. We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

Terms.footerNote: These terms may change as the product evolves.

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.body: Required for authentication, security, and core site functionality.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.body: Help us understand usage so we can improve performance and UX.

items.browser: Adjust cookie settings in your browser at any time
items.banner: Use the cookie banner to opt in or out of analytics

Cookies.footerNote: Cookie choices are stored on your device.
